sentences.english: The Gu way grows startled disgrace, body quickly the Zong jumped behind outside of circle.
sentences.chinese: 賈道長愕然失色，身子急忙後縱跳出了圈外。

sentences.english: One hundred men will test today, But only three win the Green Beret.
sentences.chinese: 縱有百條好漢參加考驗，但也僅有三人可贏得綠扁帽。

sentences.english: Yeluu galloped his horse up a hillock; stopped at the top; and surveyed the field, enjoying with great pride.
sentences.chinese: 耶律洪基縱馬上了一座小丘，立馬丘頂，顧盼自豪。

sentences.english: There also were openings of ducts in the nodes of elytral grooves that often contained accumulations of some substance.
sentences.chinese: 在鞘翅縱溝紋的念珠狀結中有管狀開口。

sentences.english: I know better than to be proud and demanding.
sentences.chinese: 不過我很明白識體，不至於會縱驕，也不會苛求。

sentences.english: Longitudinal box horse straddle is a difficulty problem in the teaching of physical education in high school.
sentences.chinese: 縱跳箱分腿騰越是中學體育教學中的難點問題。

sentences.english: Hope not for mind in women ; at their best.
sentences.chinese: 別在女人身上找心靈，縱有柔情蜜意。

sentences.english: If it was tenfold Egypt beyond that, Peter had no call to look and see.
sentences.chinese: 光彩以外，縱有十個埃及，彼得也無須去注意。

sentences.english: Hearts may agree, though heads differ.
sentences.chinese: 意見縱有分岐，但其心則仍可能一致。

sentences.english: If Shou Shen, vertical pro at nothing, only superficial ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 若不守身，縱能事親，亦只是皮毛儀式而已。

sentences.english: If not uphold the precepts, vertical attend contribution has also demons heretics.
sentences.chinese: 若不持戒律，縱修習有成，亦是天魔外道。

sentences.english: The surge force and viscous force is also included in the present hydrodynamic mathematical model.
sentences.chinese: 本數學模式亦涵蓋了縱移力與黏性力。

sentences.english: Computer use of vertical feed system for open-loop control.
sentences.chinese: 利用微機對縱進給系統進行開環控制。

sentences.english: Longitudinal trail far-off regions ethereal, go native heart mirror.
sentences.chinese: 海角天涯縱蹤跡縹緲，魂歸故土心可鑑。

sentences.english: The longitudinal cords are termed connectives.
